reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and appreciate its fantastic colors, soft material, and lightweight design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So, so beautiful, flattering, & incredibly comfortable!
items.body: I wanted a really pretty sundress that I could dress up or down when on a recent tropical vacation. This dress not only met, but exceeded my expectations! The fit is loose, but not so loose as to be unflattering. It's still figure-conscious, but hides tummy pooches, flat booties, etc. while highlighting the legs, back, & bust. The straps are adjustable and criss-cross in the back so the dress didn't slip off of my rounded shoulders. There's also a half-zipper in the back to help adjust the fit. The print has so many colors that it was easy to find a shrug that paired with it beautifully. I don't think this would work as well for those that are large-busted, especially because it has limited to no support. I found that one side of my bust kept popping out until I adjusted the straps correctly. Then it was no longer an issue. I can't wait to wear it again! Read more
items.author: ~lynnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Tall Ladies!
items.body: Very cute, light weight, summer maxi dress, great for the tall ladies! It's so tough to find a maxi long enough for my 5'7" height that doesn't look like an odd length. This dress fits the bill with a great length for the tall ladies. The top is very flattering to small chested as well. Read more
items.author: Amers41

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for the modest.
items.body: The color is as pictured. Bright and soft fabric. It is not the best quality fabric, not lined and very thin. Although it is very comfortable. Size as recommended, but if you have a chest it is a deep V front so the girls are out front. Not for the modest. Read more
items.author: Heather Morning

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for an island vacation
items.body: I loved this dress! It is subtly sexy in the front and super lightweight. I bought it to wear on vacation for our special dinners and I can't wait to wear it! Read more
items.author: Tasha Rosa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
items.body: It fit better than I expected. Love the color, style, length, although the fit in the chest is a little too revealing. I’m a 40 DD, got the XL but it was too low even though I adjusted the stripes. And if the stripes adjusted too much it looked wonky in the front. I did finally get it to a comfortable fit that I was confident wearing. It’s a beautiful sundress. Read more
items.author: CaliShellz

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, very tight and chest
items.body: Beautiful dress! However, it is extremely extremely small in the chest!! Unfortunately I will be returning. This stress is good for someone that is flat chested or maybe at most of B cup definitely not a C but if you have a belly, this will hide your belly and be very flattering. Perhaps pear shaped women this would be great for, but definitely if you Have a larger chest this is not going to work for you. Read more
items.author: Allyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO cute
items.body: SO cute! It is very revealing in the chest area as other reviews say, but I wore a cover up so that helped hide a bit. Got TONS of compliments. The colors on this are fantastic Read more
items.author: Chelsey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So sad!
items.body: I wanted to love this dress, but it’s definitely made for a bustier gal than me! Would have to have alterations and there isn’t enough time before what I purchased for. Returned. :( Read more
items.author: Kelly P.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tropical-green, Paisley, Blue, Yellow, Tropical, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
